name: Steam Up
description:
Steam Up

A Balloon Control game, where you should control a balloon using the exhausts in the ground. Each exhaust is controlled using a different letter which improves the game's difficulty.

Controls:

To Activate Exhaust: Press the letter written on the exhaust.

To clear steam on screen: Rub the screen by clicking and dragging Left Mouse Button.

Made for Curdle Game Jam.

Resources:

Sprites and images generated from canva.com.

Sound Effects made from leshylabs.com and boscaceoil.net

Credits:

Some sound Effects taken from soundbible.com

Bird sprite taken from pinclipart.com
